TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TransformPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

summary.span: 代表可在二維空間內移動、調整大小或旋轉的控制項。

span.span: Represents a control that can be moved, resized, or rotated within a two-dimensional space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此控制項模式的支援不限於桌面上的物件。Support for this control pattern is not limited to objects on the desktop. 也必須將此控制項模式支援容器物件的子系，只要子系可以移動、 調整大小或旋轉自由在容器的範圍內。This control pattern must also be supported by the children of a container object as long as the children can be moved, resized, or rotated freely within the boundaries of the container.

summary.span: 取得這個 的快取 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 屬性值。

span.span: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 結構，包含控制項模式的快取 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 屬性值。

span.span: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快取的屬性值必須已先前曾要求使用。Cached property values must have been previously requested using a . 使用取得屬性的目前值。Use to get the current value of a property. 如需可用的屬性和其使用資訊，請參閱。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

exception.span: 要求的屬性不在快取中。

span.span: The requested property is not in the cache.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly CanMoveProperty As AutomationProperty

span.span: Identifies the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 在下列範例中，根項目傳遞給函式傳回的集合[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]根的子代且符合一組屬性條件的項目。In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns a collection of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements that are descendants of the root and satisfy a set of property conditions. [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#100)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#100)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模式必須從與參考，以取得目前的值。This pattern must be from an with an reference in order to get current values. 如果使用取得、 它只快取資料，包含，並嘗試取得任何屬性的目前值引發例外狀況。If the was obtained using , it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception. 使用取得先前使用指定之屬性的快取的值。Use to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a . 如需可用的屬性和其使用資訊，請參閱。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public void Move (double x, double y);
.method public hidebysig instance void Move(float64 x, float64 y) cil managed
Public Sub Move (x As Double, y As Double)
public: void Move(double x, double y);

param.name: x
param.span: 控制項左側的絕對螢幕座標。

span.span: Absolute screen coordinates of the left side of the control.

param.name: y
param.span: 控制項上方的絕對螢幕座標。

span.span: Absolute screen coordinates of the top of the control.
Moves the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法移動、 調整大小或旋轉，使得產生的螢幕位置會完全超出座標，其容器，而無法以鍵盤或滑鼠存取物件。An object cannot be moved, resized, or rotated such that its resulting screen location would be completely outside the coordinates of its container and inaccessible to keyboard or mouse. 例如，最上層的視窗時移離螢幕完全或子物件移容器的檢視區界限之外。For example, when a top-level window is moved completely off-screen or a child object is moved outside the boundaries of the container's viewport. 在這些情況下，物件會放置最接近所要求的螢幕座標越好，覆寫為容器範圍內的頂端或左邊的座標。In these cases the object is placed as close to the requested screen coordinates as possible with the top or left coordinates overridden to be within the container boundaries. ## Examples 在下列範例中，控制項模式取自隨後使用它來移動。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and subsequently used to move the . [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#103)]

span.span: The property is false.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Pattern As AutomationPattern

span.span: Identifies the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . 例如，傳遞給方法的模式識別項擷取感興趣之控制項模式，從指定。The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified . ## Examples 在下列範例中，控制項模式取自。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an . [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void Resize (double width, double height);
.method public hidebysig instance void Resize(float64 width, float64 height) cil managed
Public Sub Resize (width As Double, height As Double)
public: void Resize(double width, double height);

param.name: width
param.span: 視窗的新寬度 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The new width of the window, in pixels.

param.name: height
param.span: 視窗的新高度 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The new height of the window, in pixels.
Resizes the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在控制項上呼叫時，支援分割窗格，這個方法可能都有副作用，調整其他相鄰的窗格大小。When called on a control that supports split panes, this method can have the side effect of resizing other contiguous panes. 無法移動、 調整大小或旋轉，使得產生的螢幕位置會完全超出座標，其容器，而無法以鍵盤或滑鼠存取物件。An object cannot be moved, resized, or rotated such that its resulting screen location would be completely outside the coordinates of its container and inaccessible to keyboard or mouse. 例如，最上層的視窗時移離螢幕完全或子物件移容器的檢視區界限之外。For example, when a top-level window is moved completely off-screen or a child object is moved outside the boundaries of the container's viewport. 在這些情況下，物件會放置最接近所要求的螢幕座標越好，覆寫為容器範圍內的頂端或左邊的座標。In these cases the object is placed as close to the requested screen coordinates as possible with the top or left coordinates overridden to be within the container boundaries. ## Examples 在下列範例中，控制項模式取自隨後使用它來調整大小。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and subsequently used to resize the . [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#104)]

span.span: The property is false.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Rotate(float64 degrees) cil managed

param.name: degrees

span.span: The number of degrees to rotate the element.

param.span: 正數會順時針旋轉，負數會逆時針旋轉。

span.span: A positive number rotates clockwise; a negative number rotates counterclockwise.
Rotates the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法移動、 調整大小或旋轉，使得產生的螢幕位置會完全超出座標，其容器，而無法以鍵盤或滑鼠存取物件。An object cannot be moved, resized, or rotated such that its resulting screen location would be completely outside the coordinates of its container and inaccessible to keyboard or mouse. 例如，最上層的視窗時移離螢幕完全或子物件移容器的檢視區界限之外。For example, when a top-level window is moved completely off-screen or a child object is moved outside the boundaries of the container's viewport. 在這些情況下，物件會放置最接近所要求的螢幕座標越好，覆寫為容器範圍內的頂端或左邊的座標。In these cases the object is placed as close to the requested screen coordinates as possible with the top or left coordinates overridden to be within the container boundaries. ## Examples 在下列範例中，控制項模式取自隨後使用它來旋轉。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and subsequently used to rotate the . [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#102)]
